Author: aiczk
Name: Astro
Changelog:
Corrected a mistake in the implementation of Floor and Round.
It is now possible to deal three cards at once during a burst.
When the "Deal three cards at burst" option is enabled, Auto play will not work except when the card charge count reaches 2 or while executing Divination.
The option "If Divination is executable, stop auto play/redraw" has been removed.
